content: **general information ** the unusual textured square motif strange signs will give you so many possibilities to create different designs you can choose how large squares you want to make to achieve absolutely different design after you join them together the pattern will look gorgeous if you use one solid color but you can use any colorway you wish the pattern includes detailed descriptions and pictures of each round starting with round 3 skill level advanced beginning terminology us **please note ** there are two files available one with all detailed pictures 12 pages another file is without detailed pictures 6 pages this is in case you do not want to print all pictures so you have a choice **stitches ** magic_ring magic_ring chain/chs chain/chains slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet double_crochet double_crochet **pattern sample yarn hook size of blanket etc ** yarn caron cakes / faerie cake yarn weight #4 worsted/aran hook size h8 5 mm sample size & shape 9 rounds = 8 7 22 cm square amount of yarn used for sample 0 23 skeins = 90 55 yds 82 8 m 46 g/1 48 oz you can use any yarn & hook you like that suits your project click on projects on top of the page to see more pattern samples
